On.description: Device on/off state. Can be set via logic.

Open.description: Whether the furnace is open. Can be set via logic.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID for the device.

NameHash.description: Custom name hash if device has been labeled.

TotalMoles.description: Total gas moles in internal atmosphere.

Combustion.description: Whether combustion is occurring in the internal atmosphere.

RatioCarbonDioxide.description: Carbon dioxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioWater.description: Water vapor ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioNitrousOxide.description: Nitrous oxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidOxygen.description: Liquid oxygen ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidNitrogen.description: Liquid nitrogen ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidCarbonDioxide.description: Liquid carbon dioxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidPollutant.description: Liquid pollutant ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidVolatiles.description: Liquid volatiles ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidNitrousOxide.description: Liquid nitrous oxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidHydrogen.description: Liquid hydrogen ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioPollutedWater.description: Polluted water ratio in internal atmosphere.

Mode.description: Read-only smelting status: 0 = No valid recipe, 1 = Valid recipe available.

Lock.description: Lock state preventing manual interaction. Can be set via logic.

Error.description: Error state indicating device malfunction or problem.

Setting.description: Output gas volume in liters per atmospheric tick. Also exposed as SettingOutput.

SettingOutput.description: Output gas volume in liters per atmospheric tick. Same as Setting.

SettingInput.description: Input gas/liquid volume in liters per atmospheric tick.

Activate.description: Write 1 to trigger ignition/spark in the furnace. Read returns 0.

RecipeHash.description: Hash of the current smelting recipe if available.

Reagents.description: Total reagent units in the internal reagent mixture.

Maximum.description: Maximum quantity that can be produced from current reagents.

Ratio.description: Fill ratio of reagents relative to capacity.

ImportCount.description: Number of items in the Import slot.

ExportCount.description: Number of items in the Export slot.

ClearMemory.description: Write-only. Write 1 to clear the device's memory/recipe.

NameHash.description: Custom name hash if device has been labeled.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID for the device.

TotalMoles.description: Total gas and liquid moles in tank.

Combustion.description: Whether combustion is occurring in the internal atmosphere.

RatioCarbonDioxide.description: Carbon dioxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioWater.description: Water vapor ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioNitrousOxide.description: Nitrous oxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidOxygen.description: Liquid oxygen ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidNitrogen.description: Liquid nitrogen ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidCarbonDioxide.description: Liquid carbon dioxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidPollutant.description: Liquid pollutant ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidVolatiles.description: Liquid volatiles ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidNitrousOxide.description: Liquid nitrous oxide ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidHydrogen.description: Liquid hydrogen ratio in internal atmosphere.

RatioPollutedWater.description: Polluted water ratio in internal atmosphere.

VolumeOfLiquid.description: Total volume of liquids in tank in liters.

Volume.description: Total volume capacity of the tank in liters.

Ratio.description: Fill ratio of tank (TotalMoles / Maximum capacity).

Maximum.description: Maximum mole capacity of the tank.

Setting.description: Target pressure setting for pressure regulation (if applicable).

TemperatureOutput.description: Temperature at the output connection in Kelvin.

TotalMolesOutput.description: Total moles at the output connection.

CombustionOutput.description: Whether combustion is occurring at the output.

RatioOxygenOutput.description: Oxygen ratio at the output connection.

RatioCarbonDioxideOutput.description: Carbon dioxide ratio at the output connection.

RatioNitrogenOutput.description: Nitrogen ratio at the output connection.

RatioPollutantOutput.description: Pollutant ratio at the output connection.

RatioVolatilesOutput.description: Volatiles ratio at the output connection.

RatioWaterOutput.description: Water vapor ratio at the output connection.

RatioNitrousOxideOutput.description: Nitrous oxide ratio at the output connection.

Pressure.description: Atmospheric pressure at sensor location in kPa.

Temperature.description: Atmospheric temperature at sensor location in Kelvin.

NameHash.description: Custom name hash if device has been labeled.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID for the device.

TotalMoles.description: Total gas moles at sensor location.

Combustion.description: Whether combustion is occurring at sensor location.

RatioCarbonDioxide.description: Carbon dioxide ratio at sensor location.

RatioWater.description: Water vapor ratio at sensor location.

RatioNitrousOxide.description: Nitrous oxide ratio at sensor location.

RatioLiquidOxygen.description: Liquid oxygen ratio at sensor location.

RatioLiquidNitrogen.description: Liquid nitrogen ratio at sensor location.

RatioLiquidCarbonDioxide.description: Liquid carbon dioxide ratio at sensor location.

RatioLiquidPollutant.description: Liquid pollutant ratio at sensor location.

RatioLiquidVolatiles.description: Liquid volatiles ratio at sensor location.

RatioLiquidNitrousOxide.description: Liquid nitrous oxide ratio at sensor location.

RatioLiquidHydrogen.description: Liquid hydrogen ratio at sensor location.

RatioPollutedWater.description: Polluted water ratio at sensor location.

VolumeOfLiquid.description: Total volume of liquids at sensor location in liters.

On.description: Device on/off state. Can be set via logic.

NameHash.description: Custom name hash if device has been labeled.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID for the device.

Lock.description: Lock state preventing manual interaction. Can be set via logic.

Error.description: Error state indicating device malfunction or problem.

Activate.description: Write 1 to activate vending operation. Read returns activation state.

ImportCount.description: Number of items in the Import slot.

ExportCount.description: Number of items in the Export slot.

ClearMemory.description: Write-only. Write 1 to clear the device's memory.

RequestHash.description: Hash of the item type being requested. Can be set via logic.

TargetPrefabHash.description: Hash of the currently targeted item type.

Quantity.description: Quantity of the targeted item available.

TargetSlotIndex.description: Index of the storage slot containing the target item.

On.description: Device on/off state. Can be set via logic.

NameHash.description: Custom name hash if device has been labeled.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID for the device.

Lock.description: Lock state preventing manual interaction. Can be set via logic.

Error.description: Error state indicating device malfunction or problem.

Activate.description: Write 1 to activate stacking/unstacking operation. Read returns activation state.

Mode.description: Operating mode: 0 = Stack (combine items), 1 = Unstack (split items). Can be set via logic.

Setting.description: Target quantity per stack when stacking, or quantity to split when unstacking. Can be set via logic.

Output.description: Output value (implementation specific). Can be set via logic.

ImportCount.description: Number of items in the Import slot.

ExportCount.description: Number of items in the Export slot.

ClearMemory.description: Write-only. Write 1 to clear the device's memory.

On.description: Device on/off state. Can be set via logic.

NameHash.description: Custom name hash if device has been labeled.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID for the device.

Lock.description: Lock state preventing manual interaction. Can be set via logic.

Open.description: Door open/closed state. Can be set via logic to open or close the door.

Mode.description: Operating mode: 0 = Closed, 1 = Open, 2 = Auto. Can be set via logic.

Setting.description: Door operation setting (possibly speed or timing parameter). Can be set via logic.

Idle.description: Returns 1 if door is not currently moving (idle state).

Activate.description: Write 1 to trigger sensor reading. Read returns activation state.

SolarAngle.description: Current angle of the sun in degrees.

SolarIrradiance.description: Solar irradiance (power per square meter) at sensor location.

Horizontal.description: Horizontal angle to the sun in degrees.

Vertical.description: Vertical angle to the sun in degrees.

Setting.description: Read-only. Current output value being read from the batch.

Setting.description: Current dial setting value. Can be set via logic or manually adjusted.

Ratio.description: Ratio of current setting to maximum (Setting / Maximum).

Power.description: Returns 1 if device has power (battery charged).
